discussion.title: Can I make a custom operator with function as one of inputs?
discussion.body:
Is it possible to create function like this: function_1(function_2, variable_1), so I can apply function_2 to variable_1 inside function_1? 
Preferebly without drastic backend changes

nodes.body: Not sure I understand, sorry - why canâ€™t you just make a new function equal to the composition?
